label: 熱田神宮
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: The third most important national Shintō shrine (kampeisha) in Japan.  The Kusanagi-no-tsurugi (The Sword) is worshiped there as the emblem of the spirit of Yamatodake-no-Mikoto. Located in Owari-no-kuni. [神道、官幣社、草薙の剣、日本武尊、尾張国]
